ygData.subject: Hail from Jythri and The Soerbaird!
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, Bards of Norrath! I am glad to see that someone has taken the initiative to keep communication open among all the bards. I thought I would use this
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings, Bards of Norrath!

I am glad to see that someone has taken the initiative to keep
communication open among all the bards.

I thought I would use this opportunity to remind all of you that I have
indeed founded a guild for bards called The Soerbaird, and we are over
thirty members strong, and growing still!

We are dedicated to writing, composing, and performing in Norrath, as well
as many othet tasks of communication and diplomacy. If you're interested in
such a group, please visit our annals at http://www.soerbaird.com

Listen and Live!

-- Jythri, Pencerdd of The Soerbaird
http://www.soerbaird.com
